reviewText: This the my favorite romantic story. I never tire of watching it. The acting is superb. You will laugh and cry. You will just fall in love with the characters. They chose the best of the best to play Dong Yi and the wonderful king. It is amazing how one story you will watch and the king is the super hero battling with swords and martial arts. This king has never run or exercised his body. Dong Yi is a character of true heart and survivor skills. She is gentle and kind, but tough and tenacious in her search for truth. You will love it. Subtitles are excellent. Easy to read and the story just is the best.All the supporting characters are either loved or despised. So well acted. Loved it!
summary: Best romantic historical story. Twists and turns and many cliff hanging moments
Title: N/A

reviewText: There are many themes discovered throughout Dongyi. King's royal duty for his country and personal love for his woman, Queen and concubines' battle inside the palace, politics and hideous plots against the innocents, brotherly love between two princes, and the courage to fight the good fight without compromising with evil.  Many ideals of Confucianism is well presented here. The main theme I saw was choosing the life of sacrifice instead of the life of personal gain. In any case, it is just full of good stuff, nothing like trashy Hollywood material. Plenty of sword fighting and marshal art scenes as well, thanks to actor Bae Soo Bin who plays Dongyi's protector Chun Soo.
summary: perhaps the best Korean drama ever, and that's saying a lot
Title: N/A

reviewText: For the best audio and video quality with the original broadcast English subtitles, look for 'Studio: MBC America' under Product Details. MBC America is the licensed US distributor for Dong Yi. MBC America works from the original MBC-TV master recordings and hires professional translators for the broadcast subtitles, which are also used for the DVD release. Each episode runs about 60 minutes. Volume 1 contains Episodes 1-20.A moving historical drama set in the Chosun Dynasty of old Korea, Dong Yi tells the story of a simple maid (Hyo Ju Han) that rises high in the royal court as a consort and ultimately becomes mother of the 21st king of Chosun. Filled with pageantry, romance, adventure and thrilling action, Dong Yi brings ancient Korea to life in this ratings favorite from director Byoung-hoon Lee (Dae Jang Geum).D. Bannon was the subtitler for the MBC America broadcast and DVD releases of episodes 11-60 of Dong Yi. He discusses subtitling inThe Elements of Subtitles, Revised and Expanded Edition: A Practical Guide to the Art of Dialogue, Character, Context, Tone and Style in Subtitling.
summary: Choose Licensed MBC America Release for Best Quality

reviewText: This series is absolutely completely beautifully done. From the acting, directing, customs, scenery, writing...a complete package. Extremely unforgettable drama. Han Hyo Joo is fantastic. You see her transform from a young lady to a Royal Noble Consort flawlessly. Well deserving of all the awards this series garnished.
Title: N/A

reviewText: As an avid historical buff, I was totally emersed in this drama.  This film was portrayed and performed to perfection by the actors; you hated the villians, cried for the suffering,  laughed and held your breath all at the same time. The young actress portraying the young Dong Yi is remarkable and I will certainly look forward to see what roles she'll choose to perform in the future. Of course the scenery and costumes were quite magnificent! I recommend this drama with this warning, it will be difficult to turn off. Enjoy...I found another movie this young girl performed in "Hwang Jin Yi"  a biography of a famous Joeson period courtesan musical artist.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is a truly inspirational drama. The story of Dong Yi is one that I have found very inspiring on a lot of levels. Her selflessness and tenacity in helping others or in the pursuit of truth was endearing to see. She had a noble and beautiful heart - hence fulfilled what her father had said to her that you are low born in so far as in your heart you do not strive for the highest and noblest things. Conversely your inner aspirations and beauty determines your station in life and Dong Yi was examplary in this. To start from Nothing and attain to the highest without plotting and schemeing as was the order of the day , just from simply being herself touched something deep inside of me. The love she shared with the King is  another heart-warming and  endearing  part of this drama. This drama ranks up there with Dae Jang Geum ( Jewel in the palace) ans Hur Jun ( the legendary doctor)
Title: N/A
